meta.query: cross-sectional equity anomaly feature engineering factor discovery SSRN

ideas.title: Intraday vs. Overnight Mispricing Split
ideas.core_idea: Separate intraday and overnight legs for the same characteristic; arbitrage frictions overnight cause predictable day–night divergence across stocks.
feature_transformations: Compute day vs. overnight returns for characteristic-ranked legs; rank-normalize each daily
Systematic-variance split: ratio of overnight to intraday beta-variance as a conditioner
ideas.universe_filters: US top 1000 by ADV; price > $3; ADV > $5M; exclude ADRs/OTC
ideas.directionality: Cross-sectional ranks; long intraday leg where overnight drag is highest; industry/beta neutral; close before EOD, re-enter on open

strength_actionability.rationale: Clear split, standard data, well-documented cross-sectional patterns

ideas.expected_horizon_notes: Backtest 2010–2025 minute bars; monitor 6 weeks live

ideas.title: Single-Stock VRP Adjusted for Turnover Shocks
ideas.core_idea: Use realized–implied volatility spread as a cross-sectional predictor but correct realized vol for turnover-induced mean reversion to restore signal power.
feature_transformations: RVol* = realized vol mean-reversion corrected to a 60d median
Turnover shock filter: shrink or drop observations with abnormal turnover
ideas.directionality: Rank long high VRP*; short low; monthly rebalance; beta/industry neutral

strength_actionability.rationale: Practical improvement on a known options–equity bridge

ideas.title: Weekly Realized Skewness Predictor
ideas.core_idea: Higher recent realized skewness forecasts underperformance next week; use intraday-derived higher moments cross-sectionally.
feature_transformations: Weekly realized skewness from 5m returns; winsorize extremes
ideas.directionality: Long lowest-skew quintile; short highest; weekly rebalance

strength_actionability.rationale: Replicable with standard HF data; well-documented

ideas.title: Downside Semivariance Ratio (RDRS) Tilt
ideas.core_idea: Use the ratio of downside semivariance to total variance to identify stocks with unfavorable downside risk; tilt toward low-RDRS names.
feature_transformations: Overlay with downside beta to market drawdowns
ideas.directionality: Long low RDRS, short high; monthly rebalance; sector/country neutral

strength_actionability.rationale: Technically sound, intuitive, needs HF data

ideas.title: Expected Growth (q5) Factor
ideas.core_idea: Forecast expected investment growth from fundamentals and sort cross-sectionally; long high expected growth, short low.
feature_transformations: Cross-sectional forecast of Δ(Investment/Assets) using q, OCF/Assets, ΔROE
Combine with profitability and investment into a q5 composite
ideas.directionality: Semiannual rebalance; beta/industry neutral

ideas.title: Quality-Minus-Junk Composite
ideas.core_idea: Multi-pillar quality (profitability, growth, safety, payout) predicts cross-sectional returns; long high-quality vs. short junk.
feature_transformations: Profitability (GP/A, ROA), Growth (ΔROA, ΔGP/A), Safety (low leverage/vol/beta), Payout (net issuance)
ideas.directionality: Quarterly rebalance; beta neutral

ideas.title: Asset Growth / Investment-to-Assets
ideas.core_idea: High recent asset growth predicts lower future returns; use Inv/A and combine with profitability to improve efficacy.
ideas.directionality: Short high Inv/A; long low; quarterly rebalance

ideas.title: Equity Loan Fee / Borrow Cost Tilt
ideas.core_idea: High loan fees signal contemporaneous short demand and predict short-horizon underperformance; sort by fee level and change.
feature_transformations: Fee level z(7d) and ΔFee(7d) composite
Interact with DTC and Amihud for squeeze risk
Exclude extreme-fee tails for cost control
ideas.directionality: Short high-fee; long low-fee; weekly rebalance

strength_actionability.rationale: Direct microstructure signal with short horizon

ideas.title: Days-to-Cover Short Interest
ideas.core_idea: DTC = short interest / ADV is a better marginal shorting-cost proxy than raw SI; high-DTC names underperform.
ideas.directionality: Short high-DTC; long low; weekly

ideas.title: MAX / β–MAX Lottery Control
ideas.core_idea: Extreme prior single-day winners (MAX) underperform; β-adjusted MAX refines the signal by controlling for market spikes.
ideas.directionality: Short top decile β–MAX; long bottom; weekly

ideas.title: Idiosyncratic Volatility Tilt
ideas.core_idea: High-IVOL names underperform; use model-residual variance to sort; strength varies across venues.
feature_transformations: IVOL(6m) from daily residuals of FF6 or q5
ideas.directionality: Long low-IVOL; short high; monthly

strength_actionability.rationale: Time-varying strength; useful as risk tilt

ideas.title: Betting Against Beta (Low-Risk)
ideas.core_idea: Constraints cause high-beta overpricing and low-beta underpricing; build a beta-neutral long-low/short-high portfolio.
feature_transformations: Shrinkage beta estimates from 2–5y daily returns
ideas.directionality: Monthly rebalance; beta, sector, country neutral

ideas.title: Analyst Target-Price Implied Return (Bias-Adjusted)
ideas.core_idea: Debias TPIR for optimism and risk misestimation using IVOL/beta and forecast errors; residual TPIR predicts returns.
feature_transformations: Bias model residual TPIR_adj (controls: β, IVOL, EPS errors)
ΔTPIR around revisions as event kicker
ideas.directionality: Rank long high TPIR_adj; short low; 1–4w holds

ideas.title: Analyst Forecast Skewness
ideas.core_idea: Asymmetric EPS forecast distributions (skewness) predict cross-sectional returns; positive skew often precedes underperformance.
feature_transformations: Estimate skewness of current-fiscal EPS estimates
ideas.directionality: Short high-skew; long low/negative; weekly

ideas.title: Conference Call Tone × Credibility
ideas.core_idea: Tone predicts event-window returns but depends on speaker/message credibility; use a tone×credibility interaction for selection.
feature_transformations: Credibility proxy from linguistic markers and manager traits
ideas.directionality: Long positive Tone_cred; short negative; 1–5d exits

strength_actionability.rationale: Enhancement over raw tone; tight horizons

ideas.title: 10‑K Text Negativity/Uncertainty Tilt
ideas.core_idea: Finance-specific negative/uncertainty lexicons applied to 10‑Ks predict weaker post-filing returns; trade changes in tone.
ideas.directionality: Short increased negativity; long improvements

strength_actionability.rationale: Public data, robust construction, low turnover

ideas.title: Employee (Glassdoor) Sentiment Factor
ideas.core_idea: Improvements in employee sentiment, especially text-based beyond stars, forecast returns; emphasize current-employee reviews and early reviewers.
ideas.directionality: Long improving; short deteriorating; quarterly/annual

ideas.title: Product-Market Links & Scope Similarity Spillovers
ideas.core_idea: Returns and news of economically linked firms (customers/suppliers/scope-similar) diffuse with a lag; propagate shocks to peers.
feature_transformations: Peer set via 10‑K text similarity or customer mapping
Visibility filter to focus on underreaction
ideas.directionality: Long positive-spillover peers; short negative; 1–3d hold

ideas.title: News-Link Momentum
ideas.core_idea: Co-mentioned firms in news show lead–lag; trade underreacting followers after leader moves.
ideas.directionality: Long predicted followers; short negative spillovers

ideas.title: ETF Flow Pressure on Constituents
ideas.equity_class: Equity ETFs (US broad and sector) and their constituents
ideas.core_idea: Large ETF creations/redemptions transmit temporary price pressure to constituents; mean-reversion follows extreme primary activity.
feature_transformations: ΔShares Outstanding (1–3d) as primary activity proxy
Allocate flow to constituents by index weights
Constituent pressure vs. non-ETF peers to form a reversal score
ideas.universe_filters: US ETFs (e.g., SPY, sector ETFs) and S&P 1500 constituents
ideas.directionality: Short flow-pushed up constituents; long dragged down; T+1–T+2 exit

strength_actionability.rationale: Promising around extremes; data access varies

ideas.title: Passive Ownership–Conditioned Reversal
ideas.core_idea: Short-term reversal is stronger among stocks with higher passive ETF ownership; condition reversal weights on passive share.
feature_transformations: Passive ownership % from ETF ownership data
Amihud control to avoid liquidity traps
ideas.directionality: Overweight reversal in high-passive names; 1–2d holds

strength_actionability.rationale: Structural conditioning boosts a classic signal

ideas.title: Industry-Level Customer→Supplier Momentum (Global)
ideas.core_idea: Customer industries’ recent returns lead supplier industries; trade supplier baskets accordingly, focusing on smaller, relationship-intensive suppliers.
ideas.directionality: Tilt supplier baskets with 2–4w holds

ideas.title: Amihud Down-Day Illiquidity Premium
ideas.core_idea: Down-day Amihud component commands the cross-sectional premium; prefer names with lower down-day price impact.
ideas.directionality: Long low Amihud−; short high; monthly

ideas.title: Local Downside Beta Premium
ideas.core_idea: Stocks with higher sensitivity to local-market downturns earn higher returns; estimate local downside beta and tilt.
feature_transformations: Local downside beta to regional index (returns < 0)
ideas.directionality: Long high local-downside-beta names; hedge market beta

strength_actionability.rationale: Newer result; ensure orthogonality to standard factors
